name: Robot Wants Kitty Level
summary: A KITTY file is a level created by Raptisoft Robot Wants Kitty, a game that revolves around a robot navigating different levels to find a kitty. It contains information about a level in a proprietary binary format, including its name, references to in-game music files, and locations of enemies, power-ups, the robot, and kitty. Users typically import and export KITTY files from the iOS version of the game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: KITTY file open in Tiled 2 with RWK Tiled plugin
